categoryUrls.description: Enter urls of Amazon categories. You can also use specific product URLs directly.

maxItems.description: Enter maximum number of items that can be scraped. Remember this actor gets maximum 50 items per URL.

proxyConfiguration.description: Use proxy to avoid blocking. You can set proxy groups from specific countries to get region-specific results.

detailedInformation.description: Check if you want to get more information to the individual products.

debug.description: Check if you want to display debug logs.
